message: Given that your money loses 10% value each round, this 4000$ now is worth more than 6000$ next round. Let's conclude this efficiently.
Counteroffer, slightly better split for you

At this point, due to 29% inflation on your side, this 3500$ is worth about 2485$ to you. If you reject, next round's money will be worth even less. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
